_header: On a dear day by a dale so deep
Note: For a piece similar in theme see 2452.
_description: ‘Fortis vt mors dileccio’ — ten 12-line stanzas including refrain, ‘Fortis vt mors dileccio’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
On a dere day by a dale so depeAs I went thorow a
                    wyldernes…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…As tellith this tyxt for love aloneffortis vt mors
                        dileccioExplicit
